job.title: Elixir Software Engineer - Elixir, Elm, Graphql, PostgreSQL
job.description: If you are a Elixir Software Engineer with experience please read onltbrgtltbrgtWe are an environmental friendly company that works on a real time energy balancing platform We need an engineer to add new capacities to our Elixir control platformltbrgtltbrgtWhat You Need for this Positionltbrgtltulgtltligt 4 years of professional experienceltligtltligt Elixirltligtltligt Graphqlltligtltligt PostgreSQLltligtltligt AWSltligtltligt ELMltbrgtltligtltulgtSo if you are a Elixir Software Engineer with experience please apply todayltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtltugtEmail Your Resume In Word ToltbrgtltbrgtltugtltstronggtLooking forward to receiving your resume through our website and going over the position with you Clicking apply is the best way to apply but you may alsoltbrgtltbrgtChrisCavishCyberCoderscomltbrgtltulgtltligtPlease do NOT change the email subject line in any way You must keep the JobID linkedin  CC181643092  in the email subject line for your application to be consideredltbrgtltligtltulgtChris Cavish  Recruiter  CyberCodersltbrgtltbrgtApplicants must be authorized to work in the USltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtCyberCoders Inc is proud to be an Equal Opportunity EmployerltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtAll qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race color religion sex national origin disability protected veteran status or any other characteristic protected by lawltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtYour Right to Workltstronggt  In compliance with federal law all persons hired will be required to verify identity and eligibility to work in the United States and to complete the required employment eligibility verification document form upon hireltbrgtltbrgtCyberCoders will consider for Employment in the City of Los Angeles qualified Applicants with Criminal Histories in a manner consistent with the requirements of the Los Angeles Fair Chance Initiative for Hiring Ban the Box Ordinance
